Name: Exit Café
Review Text:
Staff is very rude! 3 of us had a pitcher of vodka something and when my friend asked how many shots are in one because we can barely feel it, the waiter answered him; maybe you are too alcoholic to feel it!
On the bill we saw there were only 2 shots!!! Low quality place
